from orders_trade ordersTrade
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into orders_trade (order_id, order_sn, pay_time, payment_status, money_product, money_logistics, money_coupon, money_act_full, money_discount, money_back, money_integral, integral, payment_name, payment_code, trade_sn, codconfirm_id, installment_time, monthly_principal, monthly_service, bank_id, capital_id, term, capital_order_id, contract_num ) values (#{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{paymentStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{moneyProduct,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{moneyLogistics,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{moneyCoupon,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{moneyActFull,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{moneyDiscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{moneyBack,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{moneyIntegral,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{integral,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{paymentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paymentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tradeSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{codconfirmId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{installmentTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{monthlyPrincipal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{monthlyService,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{bankId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{capitalId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{term,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{capitalOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contractNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

update orders_trade ordersTrade
ordersTrade.order_id = #{record.orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ordersTrade.order_sn = #{record.orderSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ordersTrade.pay_time = #{record.payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ordersTrade.payment_status = #{record.paymentStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ordersTrade.money_product = #{record.moneyProduct,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ordersTrade.money_logistics = #{record.moneyLogistics,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ordersTrade.money_coupon = #{record.moneyCoupon,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ordersTrade.money_act_full = #{record.moneyActFull,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ordersTrade.money_discount = #{record.moneyDiscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ordersTrade.money_back = #{record.moneyBack,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ordersTrade.money_integral = #{record.moneyIntegral,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ordersTrade.integral = #{record.integral,jdbcType=INTEGER},

ordersTrade.payment_code = #{record.paymentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ordersTrade.trade_sn = #{record.tradeSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ordersTrade.codconfirm_id = #{record.codconfirmId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ordersTrade.installment_time = #{record.installmentTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

ordersTrade.monthly_service = #{record.monthlyService,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ordersTrade.bank_id = #{record.bankId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ordersTrade.capital_id = #{record.capitalId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ordersTrade.term = #{record.term,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ordersTrade.capital_order_id = #{record.capitalOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ordersTrade.contract_num = #{record.contractNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update orders_trade ordersTrade set ordersTrade.order_id = #{record.orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ordersTrade.order_sn = #{record.orderSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ordersTrade.pay_time = #{record.payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ordersTrade.payment_status = #{record.paymentStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ordersTrade.money_product = #{record.moneyProduct,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ordersTrade.money_logistics = #{record.moneyLogistics,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ordersTrade.money_coupon = #{record.moneyCoupon,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ordersTrade.money_act_full = #{record.moneyActFull,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ordersTrade.money_discount = #{record.moneyDiscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ordersTrade.money_back = #{record.moneyBack,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ordersTrade.money_integral = #{record.moneyIntegral,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ordersTrade.integral = #{record.integral,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ordersTrade.payment_name = #{record.paymentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ordersTrade.payment_code = #{record.paymentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ordersTrade.trade_sn = #{record.tradeSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ordersTrade.codconfirm_id = #{record.codconfirmId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ordersTrade.installment_time = #{record.installmentTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ordersTrade.monthly_principal = #{record.monthlyPrincipal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ordersTrade.monthly_service = #{record.monthlyService,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ordersTrade.bank_id = #{record.bankId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ordersTrade.capital_id = #{record.capitalId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ordersTrade.term = #{record.term,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ordersTrade.capital_order_id = #{record.capitalOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ordersTrade.contract_num = #{record.contractNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update orders_trade
order_sn = #{orderSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pay_time = #{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
payment_status = #{paymentStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
money_product = #{moneyProduct,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
money_logistics = #{moneyLogistics,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
money_coupon = #{moneyCoupon,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
money_act_full = #{moneyActFull,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
money_discount = #{moneyDiscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
money_back = #{moneyBack,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
money_integral = #{moneyIntegral,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
integral = #{integral,jdbcType=INTEGER},
payment_name = #{paymentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
payment_code = #{paymentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
trade_sn = #{tradeSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
codconfirm_id = #{codconfirmId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
installment_time = #{installmentTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
monthly_principal = #{monthlyPrincipal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
monthly_service = #{monthlyService,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
bank_id = #{bankId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
capital_id = #{capitalId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
term = #{term,jdbcType=INTEGER},
capital_order_id = #{capitalOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contract_num = #{contractNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update orders_trade set order_sn = #{orderSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_time = #{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, payment_status = #{paymentStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, money_product = #{moneyProduct,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, money_logistics = #{moneyLogistics,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, money_coupon = #{moneyCoupon,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, money_act_full = #{moneyActFull,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, money_discount = #{moneyDiscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, money_back = #{moneyBack,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, money_integral = #{moneyIntegral,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, integral = #{integral,jdbcType=INTEGER}, payment_name = #{paymentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, payment_code = #{paymentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, trade_sn = #{tradeSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, codconfirm_id = #{codconfirmId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, installment_time = #{installmentTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, monthly_principal = #{monthlyPrincipal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, monthly_service = #{monthlyService,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, bank_id = #{bankId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, capital_id = #{capitalId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, term = #{term,jdbcType=INTEGER}, capital_order_id = #{capitalOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contract_num = #{contractNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
